extras.init:
Choose category
wanted to know
my commands

mod.content:
Ban - (Ban members) - Ban members from your server
Unban - (Ban Members) - Unban a member on your server
Kick - (Kick Members) - Kicks a person from your server
Clear - (Manage channels) - Clears the chat from your server
SetLogs - (Manage channels) - Sets the bot's logs channel
AutoRole - (Manage channels) - Sets a role to Autorole
SetLang - (Manage Server) - Sets the bot's language
AddWarning - (Kick Members) - Gives a member a warning
RemoveWarning - (Remove Members) - Removes a warning from a member
ForceMove - (Move members) - Moves a member from one call to another
ForceDisconnect - (Move members) - Disconnects a member from a call
Embed - (Manage channels) - Sends an embed in the desired chat
EditEmbed - (Manage channels) - Edit an embed already sent in the desired chat

general.name: General
general.content:
HelloWorld - Markuus test command
Random - Choose a random number for you
Ping - Shows my ping and discord api
Servers - Tells how many servers I'm on
Userinfo - pulls a member's information or their
ServerInfo - pulls information from the server
Invite - Send the link to invite the bot
Warns - Sends a member's warnings

economy.name: Economy
economy.content:
Roll - You can win from 0 to 2000 edinhos
Wallet - Shows how many edinhos you have or from the mentioned member
edinhosTop - Shows the rank of richest people
SlotMachine - You can bet on luck and quadruple your edinhos
Transfer - You can transfer edinhos to other people

suport.name: Support
suport.content:
Suggest - Send a suggestion to my owner
Report - Send a report to my owner

image.name: Images
image.content:
Cat - Send an image of a random cat
Achievement_Minecraft - Create a minecraft achievement
Perfection - Create a "perfection" meme
wanted - Create a wanted poster
Body_Minecraft - Sends the body of a minecraft player
Skin_Minecraft - Sends the skin of a minecraft player
Avatar_Player_Minecraft - Sends the avatar of a minecraft player
Head_Minecraft - Sends the head of a minecraft player

actions.name: Actions
actions.content:
Hug - Hugs a member
Bite - Bite a member
Slap - Hits a member
Kiss - Kiss a member
Cafune - Cafune someone
Punch - Punch some member
Lick - Lick a member
FlipCoin - Flip a coin
